# BBQ Sauce {#bbq_sauce}

Yes it's probably not strictly Mexican. But it goes really well with my [pulled pork](#pulled_pork) so I'm including it.

## Ingredients

**Makes half a jar**

- 150g tomato ketchup (can use no sugar)
- 40 ml white wine vinegar
- 30g dark brown sugar
- 10g unsalted butter
- 2 tbsp dark soy sauce
- 1 tbsp whole grain mustard
- 1 tsp smoked paprika

## Method

1. Add all ingrdients to a small saucepan
2. Bring to boil and simmer for 5 mins
3. Transfer to jar and store in fridge
